page.title: 05A RESIDENT'S ROUTINE,PART 1
page.content: {Mrs Ann Wray is a typical resident who {lives in Back Lane almost opposite {Helperby Hall.When we interviewed her {she gave us the following information: { { 7:00 Mrs Wray decides to get up. { 7:30 She makes the breakfast which { consists of toast and honey { washed down by several cups of { coffee. { 7:45 She persuades her daughter to { rise from her beauty sleep. { 8:00 She prepares breakfast for her { daughter Sarah. { 8:30 She busies herself with the { housework,e.g.vacuuming,dusting. {10:00 She goes to work for an old lady { in Helperby. {12:00 She cooks lunch for her husband: { always meat and vegetables. {12:30 She has a cup of coffee while { she waits for the school bus.
